attributes.title: bad app quality
attributes.review: the app itself is very glitchy and slow for me. it’s very poorly made and is overall just visually unpleasant. it’s difficult to find my way around too. 0/10, i’d rate this 0 stars if i had the option, don’t get the app, it’s a waste of time.

attributes.title: Bye
attributes.review: This app is very unnecessary and took a lot like a lot of space on my phone I highly do not recommend !.

Now I dearly love this president🧚🏻‍♂️💓the day was Fourth of July . And when I opened the app this Cheeto man ruined my day.i scrolled through and saw Cheetos with crusty ramen hair I am very very disappointed in this app😭🤷🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I was completely disgusted by this app. I don’t know if it’s just me but I hated it. By the looks of the reviews, it isn’t just me.
